typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Sno as short,
		OrderDate as date,
		Region as string,
		Rep as string,
		Item as string,
		Units as short,
		{Unit Cost} as double,
		Total as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Sno as integer,
		OrderDate as date,
		Region as string,
		Rep as string,
		Item as string,
		Units as decimal(8,2),
		UnitCost as decimal(8,2),
		Total as decimal(8,2)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Sno'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Sno,
		OrderDate,
		Region,
		Rep,
		Item,
		Units,
		UnitCost = {Unit Cost},
		Total
	)) ~> sink1
